schema.name: report_date
schema.description: Date of the feature quality report

schema.name: total_players
schema.description: Total number of players in feature store for this date

schema.name: quality_ready_count
schema.description: Number of players passing quality readiness check (is_quality_ready=true)

schema.name: quality_ready_pct
schema.description: Percentage of players that are quality ready

schema.name: avg_feature_quality_score
schema.description: Average feature quality score across all players

schema.name: red_alert_count
schema.description: Number of players with red quality alerts

schema.name: yellow_alert_count
schema.description: Number of players with yellow quality alerts

schema.name: green_alert_count
schema.description: Number of players with green quality alerts

schema.name: avg_player_history_quality_pct
schema.description: Average player history category quality percentage

schema.name: avg_team_context_quality_pct
schema.description: Average team context category quality percentage

schema.name: avg_game_context_quality_pct
schema.description: Average game context category quality percentage

schema.name: players_with_defaults
schema.description: Number of players with any default features

schema.name: avg_default_feature_count
schema.description: Average number of default features per player

schema.name: top_missing_processors
schema.description: JSON array of most common missing processor patterns

schema.name: computation_timestamp
schema.description: When this trend record was computed

description: Daily feature quality metrics for trend tracking. Session 209: Priority 2 - Historical tracking to answer 'Is quality improving or declining?'
